1.0.2.name: wordpress/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway
1.0.2.description:
Novalnet Gateway is one of the popular payment gateways in Germany that enables online-stores accepting debit and credit cards, as well as other payment mediums.By using the WooCommerce payment plugin and the comprehensive service of Novalnet AG the leading full service payment provider you can significantly increase your turnover and spend more time on your actual core business. Thus you receive an all-in-one solution: the shop plugin WooCommerce which is perfectly adjusted to WordPress and the top-quality range of services of the payment provider Novalnet.

    Novalnet AG (Link http://www.novalnet.com/ Link Text: Straight to Novalnet) is a financial services institute licensed and supervised by the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin), specialized in payment solutions world-wide and meeting the highest standards.
